TOOLTIP_MOVE_PANEL_RIGHT.description: tooltip for moving the panel to the right

PLACEHOLDER_DEFINITIONS.message: Lookup a word to show definitions...

PLACEHOLDER_INFLECT.message: Lookup a word to show inflections...

LABEL_INFLECT_SELECT_POFS.description: label for part of speech selector on inflections panel

LABEL_INFLECT_HIDEEMPTY.description: label for hide empty columns button on inflections panel

TEXT_INFO_ACTIVATE.message: Activate on a page with Latin, Ancient Greek, Arabic or Persian text.

TEXT_INFO_CLICK.message: Double-click on a word to retrieve morphology and short definitions.

TEXT_INFO_LANGDETECT.message: Alpheios will try to detect the language of the word from the page markup. If it cannot it will use the default language.

LABEL_INFO_CURRENTLANGUAGE.description: label for current language in info text

TEXT_INFO_SETTINGS.message: Click the Settings wheel to change the default language, default dictionaries or to disable the popup (set UI Type to 'panel').

TEXT_INFO_ARROW.message: Use the arrow at the top of this panel to move it from the right to left of your browser window.

TEXT_INFO_REOPEN.message: You can reopen this panel at any time by selecting 'Info' from the Alpheios Reading Tools option in your browser's context menu.

TEXT_INFO_DEACTIVATE.message: Deactivate Alpheios by clicking the toolbar icon or choosing 'Deactivate' from the Alpheios Reading Tools option in your browser's context menu.

LABEL_POPUP_INFLECT.description: label for inflect button on popup

LABEL_POPUP_OPTIONS.description: label for options button on popup

LABEL_POPUP_DEFINE.description: label for define button on popup

PLACEHOLDER_POPUP_DATA.message: No lexical data is available yet

LABEL_POPUP_SHOWCREDITS.description: label for show credits link on popup

LABEL_POPUP_HIDECREDITS.description: label for hide credits link on popup

TEXT_NOTICE_GRAMMAR_NOTFOUND.message: The requested grammar resource is not currently available

TEXT_NOTICE_MORPHDATA_NOTFOUND.message: Morphological data not found. Definition queries pending.

TEXT_NOTICE_DEFSDATA_NOTFOUND.message: {requestType} request failed. Lemma not found for: "{word}"
